name: Voodoo (itch) (Brain in the Box)
description: Voodoo is a survival game set in a fantasy primal africa where you will be one of the founders of civilization. Build your village with your friends or other people you will meet in the game, and start fighting against other players' villages. And for the first time, we are showing some gameplay footage of the Izimu fight. Izimus are ancients gods that you and your friends will have to defeat to gain poweful loot for you and technologies for your village. But beware, every Izimu will have a different way to kill it, so you have to study your enemy and be prepared. Will you manage to be the strongest to start leading your civilization? or will you fall, defeated by your many enemies? The decision is up to you.
